Detailed Description

File system plugin module Module that handles file system access

Define Documentation

#define orxFILESYSTEM_KU32_FLAG_INFO_DIR   0x00000008

directory

#define orxFILESYSTEM_KU32_FLAG_INFO_HIDDEN   0x00000004

hidden file

#define orxFILESYSTEM_KU32_FLAG_INFO_NORMAL   0x00000001

normal file

#define orxFILESYSTEM_KU32_FLAG_INFO_RDONLY   0x00000002

read-only file

#define orxFILESYSTEM_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_APPEND   0x00000004

descriptor positioned at the end of file

#define orxFILESYSTEM_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_READ   0x00000001

opened for read

#define orxFILESYSTEM_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_WRITE   0x00000002

opened for write

orxDLLAPI orxSTATUS orxFASTCALL orxFileSystem_Deltree ( orxCONST orxSTRING  _zDirectory  ) 

Delete recursively a direcory and all its subfolders.

Parameters:
_zDirectory (IN) Name of the directory directory to remove (with subfolders)
Returns:
status of the operation (orxSTATUS_FAILURE or orxSTATUS_SUCCESS)

orxDLLAPI orxBOOL orxFASTCALL orxFileSystem_Exists ( orxCONST orxSTRING  _zFileName  ) 

Returns orxTRUE if a file exists, else orxFALSE.

Parameters:
_zFileName (IN) Full File's name to test
Returns:
orxFALSE if _zFileName doesn't exist, else orxTRUE

Uninitialize the File Module

orxDLLAPI orxVOID orxFileSystem_FindClose ( orxFILESYSTEM_INFO *  _pstFileInfo  ) 

Closes a search (free the memory allocated for this search).

Parameters:
_pstFileInfos (IN) Informations returned during search

orxDLLAPI orxBOOL orxFileSystem_FindFirst ( orxCONST orxSTRING  _zSearchPattern,
orxFILESYSTEM_INFO *  _pstFileInfo 
)

Starts a new search. Find the first file that will match to the given pattern (e.g : /bin/toto* or c:\*.*)

Parameters:
_zSearchPattern (IN) Pattern to find
_pstFileInfos (OUT) Informations about the first file found
Returns:
orxTRUE if a file has been found, else orxFALSE

orxDLLAPI orxBOOL orxFileSystem_FindNext ( orxFILESYSTEM_INFO *  _pstFileInfo  ) 

Continues a search. Find the next occurence of a pattern. The search has to be started with orxFileSystem_FindFirst

Parameters:
_pstFileInfos (IN/OUT) Informations about the found file
Returns:
orxTRUE, if the next file has been found, else returns orxFALSE

orxFILESYSTEM_INFO *  _pstFileInfo 
)

Parameters:

_pstFileInfos (OUT) Returned file's informations
Returns:
Returns the status of the operation
